creator: Logiciel, Inc.
descriptionHtml: This App is the customer-facing component of Fora - Logiciel Cloud-based Mobile Commerce Platform designed for businesses to engage their customers on their smartphone. Customers using the app will be able to browse and search products, view catalogs, perform in-App purchases, track orders and communicate in real-time with the business.  User can also use the App to search for products and sign up with other Fora businesses to create his/her personal marketplace with businesses of their choice. In that case, the App is also served as the gateway to their personal marketplace providing single sign-on access to all their favorite businesses.
descriptionShort: Fora is a direct promotional and sales app for both business and consumer use.
title: Fora Marketplace

creator: Logiciel, Inc.

descriptionShort: Fora is a direct promotional and sales app for both business and consumer use.
title: Fora Marketplace

creator: Logiciel, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This app is the customer-facing component of Fora – Logiciel Mobile Commerce Platform designed for businesses to engage their customers on their phones.

As a business, you can set up an account in the Fora Marketplace to deploy a full-featured mobile app for your customers to browse and shop your business on their phone. Better yet, take out a white label app with your logo to promote your brand. The Fora platform is designed to support a wide variety of industries including Retail, Wholesale, Hospitality (Restaurant, Craft Brewery, Fast Food, Food Truck), Grocery Stores, Farm-to-Table / Boat-to-Table (Farmers Market, Fishermen’s market), and more. If your business doesn’t engage in eCommerce, simply turn off the ordering feature to use Fora as an information platform for engaging and staying connected with your followers. Fora can be easily customized to meet your business needs. No coding is required, no annual contract, and is designed for rapid deployment so your app will be up and running in days not months.

As the end-user of the Fora app, you will be receiving a push notification each time when your favorite merchants publish new content on the platform. This could be their featured items of the month, new arrivals, promotions, daily specials of the Restaurant, seasonal produce from the farmer, or fresh catches from the fisherman. You can use the app to place an order for in-store pickup and shipping; and if it is an eatery, order take-out, delivery, sign up on their waitlist and make a reservation.

Fora helps business to better serve you, their loyal customers. Giving you the convenience to shop their business at any time from anywhere and offering you curated content based on your buying preferences. You can use the app to search for products and sign up with other Fora merchants on the platform to create your personal marketplace populated only with merchants of your choice. Now you can access all your favorite businesses using a single sign-in through Fora.

Fora is incredibly easy to use. Download Fora now and you will never miss a special or promotion offered by your favorite merchants. You can browse and search products, thumb through their catalogs, make in-app purchases, track orders, and communicate in real-time with the business.
descriptionShort: Logiciel – Fora App Platform for browsing and shopping your favorite businesses.
title: Fora: Mobile Commerce Platform

creator: Logiciel, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This app is the customer-facing component of Logiciel Mobile e-Commerce Platform - FORA designed for businesses to better serve you, their loyal customer offering you personalized content and the convenience to shop their business on your phone. With the app, you can also search and add businesses of your choice to create your own marketplace giving you the convenience of a single sign-in to access all your favorite businesses in one app. No third-party websites to navigate and no URL and password to remember.

You will never miss a promotion or special offered by your favorite businesses. You will receive a push notification each time they publish new content. You can view their products, thumb through their catalogs, and place orders on your phone at any time from anywhere. With in-app messaging - you can communicate in real-time with the merchant to check product availability and order status.

So ask your favorite businesses to go to www.GoFora.net and join the marketplace so you can shop their business easily from your phone.
descriptionShort: This is the customer-facing app of Logiciel Mobile e-Commerce Platform – FORA.
title: Fora Marketplace
